title: Making the most of the micro 1-5
brief_description: Designed for new microcomputer users. Part 1: “The Versatile machine” 2: “Getting down to basic” deals with writing a computer program in BASIC. 3: “Strings and things” addresses the ability of the microcomputer to handle words as well as numbers. 4: “Introducing graphics”. 5: “Keeping a record”.
